title: 89/407/EEC: Commission Decision of 26 June 1989 amending Decision 86/77/EEC approving certain food-aid operations carried out by humanitarian organizations and exempting them from monetary compensatory amounts (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 26 June 1989
amending Decision 86/77/EEC approving certain food-aid operations carried out by humanitarian organizations and exempting them from monetary compensatory amounts
(Only the English text is authentic)
(89/407/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The humanitarian organization 'Mission Aviation Fellowship' is added to the Annex of Decision 86/77/EEC, with effect from 1 June 1989.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 June 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 164, 24. 6. 1985, p. 6.
(2) OJ No L 182, 3. 7. 1987, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 310, 21. 11. 1985, p. 9.
(4) OJ No L 307, 12. 11. 1988, p. 28.
(5) OJ No L 76, 21. 3. 1986, p. 54.
(6) OJ No L 9, 13. 1. 1988, p. 11.
